content:
henrikrxn opened issue #6310:

Feature

The Wastime docs should mention the possibility to use winget when installing the CLI on Windows

Benefit

Makes it easier for wasmtime users on Windows to install and upgrade Wasmtime

Implementation

N/A

Alternatives

N/A

henrikrxn commented on issue #6310:

Closing because Winget package manifest is not maintained by bytecodealliance, but by a third party

Therefore I do not think it should be mentioned in the docs

henrikrxn closed issue #6310:

Feature

The Wastime docs should mention the possibility to use winget when installing the CLI on Windows

Implementation
